issue.title: developer.mozilla.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://developer.mozilla.org](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org) ### Comment > `developer.mozilla.org` (MDN) uses contextual advertising and should arguably be included in the filter unblocking search ads and self-promotions, and useful (contextual) unblocking ads filter. Currently, it is not unblocked when EasyList is enabled. > > https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/advertising > > https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/master/UsefulAdsFilter/sections/usefulads.txt > > https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersRegistry/master/filters/filter_10_Useful/filter.txt > > To reproduce: > > 1. Download clean build of latest Firefox stable or Firefox Developer. > 2. Install uBlock Origin. > 3. Enable EasyList. > 4. Enable either of the above filters. > 5. Visit MDN documentation, e.g. `https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript`. Ad should be visible in the left-hand column. > > Suggested filter rule: > > `||developer.mozilla.org/pong/` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hgkor7ws0tw8wcogkk48oo8000w00c432542vnzasq.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

issue.title: На 4pda при поиске в тредах лезет (контекстная) реклама.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://4pda.to/forum/index.php?forums=285&topics=601691&act=search&source=pst&query=alpha

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. На 4pda при поиске в тредах лезет (контекстная) реклама. Обычными фильтрами не блочится. ID у рекламного блока рандомный.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
(https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/12525093/0d0d9b83-03dd-413d-aaab-371d01772901)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
